about_the_game:
Set in a 2D cyberpunk environment, Chrono-Shift tells the story of one man’s battle against an evil megacorporation. Gifted with the power of time travel, he must fight his way through hordes of robots to liberate a futuristic city. Solve captivating time travel puzzles. Fight robots sent by the evil megacorporation to stop you with action-packed movement based combat. Explore a vividly rendered dystopian metropolis, with a variety of different backdrops. Experience classic, action-packed platformer gameplay. Chrono-Shift is developed by a small team of passionate high schoolers.

Features:
  • A detailed and Informative tutorial
  • Five action-packed platformer levels, including a boss battle
  • A unique time-travel mechanic
  • Fast-paced platformer movement, including dash-based combat
  • Stamina and health systems
  • Three unique enemy types
  • Time-travel based puzzles
  • Vivid 2D cyberpunk art and assets
  • No saving for added difficulty
